mapper.sql: sid, stime, sbusinesstype, scustomername, scustomerschool, scustomercollege, scustomermajor, scustomercardid, scustomerbankcardid, scustomergrade, speoplenum, studyfee, spacefee, backfee, depositfee, sale, dept, sarea, sremark, stateid
mapper.insert: insert into signed (sid, stime, sbusinesstype, scustomername, scustomerschool, scustomercollege, scustomermajor, scustomercardid, scustomerbankcardid, scustomergrade, speoplenum, studyfee, spacefee, backfee, depositfee, sale, dept, sarea, sremark, stateid) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbusinesstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomerschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomercollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomermajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomercardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomerbankcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scustomergrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studyfee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{spacefee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{backfee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{depositfee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

sid,
stime,

mapper.update:
update signed
stime = #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sbusinesstype = #{sbusinesstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomername = #{scustomername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomerschool = #{scustomerschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomercollege = #{scustomercollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomermajor = #{scustomermajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomercardid = #{scustomercardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomerbankcardid = #{scustomerbankcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scustomergrade = #{scustomergrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speoplenum = #{speoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
studyfee = #{studyfee,jdbcType=REAL},
spacefee = #{spacefee,jdbcType=REAL},
backfee = #{backfee,jdbcType=REAL},
depositfee = #{depositfee,jdbcType=REAL},
sale = #{sale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sarea = #{sarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sremark = #{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stateid = #{stateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update signed set stime = #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbusinesstype = #{sbusinesstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomername = #{scustomername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomerschool = #{scustomerschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomercollege = #{scustomercollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomermajor = #{scustomermajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomercardid = #{scustomercardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomerbankcardid = #{scustomerbankcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scustomergrade = #{scustomergrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speoplenum = #{speoplenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, studyfee = #{studyfee,jdbcType=REAL}, spacefee = #{spacefee,jdbcType=REAL}, backfee = #{backfee,jdbcType=REAL}, depositfee = #{depositfee,jdbcType=REAL}, sale = #{sale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sarea = #{sarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sremark = #{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stateid = #{stateid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sid, stime, sbusinesstype, scustomername, scustomerschool, scustomercollege, scustomermajor, scustomercardid, scustomerbankcardid, scustomergrade, speoplenum, studyfee, spacefee, backfee, depositfee, sale, dept, sarea, sremark,st.stateid,st.`condition` FROM signed si INNER JOIN `status` st ON si.stateid = st.stateid WHERE sale=#{sale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY stime DESC

SELECT si.sid, stime, sbusinesstype, scustomername, scustomerschool, scustomercollege, scustomermajor, scustomercardid, scustomerbankcardid, scustomergrade, speoplenum, studyfee, spacefee, backfee, depositfee, sale, dept, sarea, sremark,si.stateid, allmoney `condition` FROM signed si LEFT JOIN (SELECT sid,sum(amount) allmoney FROM iaer GROUP BY sid) s ON s.sid = si.sid WHERE si.stateid=#{stateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select si.sid, stime, sbusinesstype, scustomername, scustomerschool, scustomercollege, scustomermajor, scustomercardid, scustomerbankcardid, scustomergrade, speoplenum, studyfee, spacefee, backfee, depositfee, sale, dept, sarea, sremark,si.stateid,IFNULL(allmoney,0) `condition` from signed si LEFT JOIN (SELECT sid,sum(amount) allmoney FROM iaer ) s ON s.sid = si.sid where si.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into iaer (id, time, type, amount, handler, remark, sid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
